prompts: Create a small, furry Pokemon that digs through snow and ice.
Imagine a Pokemon resembling a cozy, brown creature with a round body and cute markings.
Generate a Pokemon with a powerful sense of smell, living in cold, mountainous regions.
Design a Pokemon with a unique ability to sense vibrations in the ground.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in snowy habitats and has a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a small, mammoth-like creature with soft fur and tiny eyes.
I want a Pokemon that loves to burrow in the snow and has unique brown stripes.

distinctive_features: Small, pink circular marking on the side
